data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Invoice Header-Invoice'
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEADER_INVOICE
  as select from ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEAD_RPR as Header
    inner join   ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVH  as InvoiceHeader on Header.filen = InvoiceHeader.FileExportNumber

{
  key Header.filen,
  key InvoiceHeader.BillingDocument,
      Header.expty,
      Header.expty_txt,
      Header.bukrs,
      Header.bukrs_txt,
      Header.descr,
      Header.bldat,
      Header.extco,
      Header.extco_txt,
      Header.extrg,
      Header.desco,
      Header.desco_txt,
      Header.desrg,
      Header.pymty,
      Header.pymty_txt,
      Header.trnty,
      Header.trnty_txt,
      Header.cuscd,
      Header.cuscd_txt,
      Header.cofrp,
      Header.cusof,
      Header.cusof_txt,
      Header.sfrrp,
      Header.shpfr,
      Header.shpfr_txt,
      Header.bfrrp,
      Header.brofr,
      Header.brofr_txt,
      Header.extfn,
      Header.rexdt,
      Header.cedno,
      Header.ceddt,
      Header.shpdt,
      Header.shpno,
      Header.extdt,
      Header.desdt,
      Header.nopck,
      Header.clsed,
      Header.fldel,
      Header.chind,
      Header.bankl,
      Header.iban,
      Header.BankName,
      Header.BankBranch,
      Header.kunrg,
      Header.kunrg_txt,
      Header.inc01,
      Header.inc02,
      Header.lcnum,
      Header.plaka,
      Header.snrkp,
      Header.ucsno,
      Header.ucstr,
      Header.hzrtr,
      Header.beyts,
      Header.beysa,
      Header.beyty,
      Header.hatbl,
      Header.gemia,
      Header.sefno,
      Header.sbeyt,
      Header.bolnumber,
      Header.brgew,
      Header.ntgew,
      Header.gewei,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure : 'gewei'
      Header.volum,
      Header.voleh,
      Header.erdat,
      Header.ernam,
      Header.erzet,
      Header.aedat,
      Header.aezet,
      Header.aenam,
      Header.reffn,
      Header.incno,
      InvoiceHeader.FileExportNumber,
      InvoiceHeader.CompanyCode,
      InvoiceHeader.CompanyCodeName,
      InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentType,
      InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentTypeName,
      InvoiceHeader.SalesOrganization,
      InvoiceHeader.SalesOrganizationName,
      InvoiceHeader.DistributionChannel,
      InvoiceHeader.DistributionChannelName,
      InvoiceHeader.Division,
      InvoiceHeader.DivisionName,
      InvoiceHeader.PayerParty,
      InvoiceHeader.PayerPartyName,
      InvoiceHeader.SoldToParty,
      InvoiceHeader.SoldToPartyName,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      InvoiceHeader.TotalNetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'
      InvoiceHeader.TotalTaxAmount,
      InvoiceHeader.TransactionCurrency,
      InvoiceHeader.BillingDocumentDate,
      InvoiceHeader.DocumentReferenceID,
      InvoiceHeader.CustomerPaymentTerms,
      InvoiceHeader.CustomerPaymentTermsName,
      InvoiceHeader.IncotermsClassification,
      InvoiceHeader.IncotermsTransferLocation,
      InvoiceHeader.IncotermsVersion,
      InvoiceHeader.CreationDate,
      InvoiceHeader.CreationTime,
      InvoiceHeader.CreatedByUser,
      InvoiceHeader.AccountingTransferStatus,
      InvoiceHeader.AccountingTransferStatusText
      //,
      //_Invoice : redirected to parent ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_HEADER
}

],

[],

"ANNOREF_EVALUATION_ERROR":""
}
